description:
Chess24 is an online chess platform founded in 2011 that provides various chess services including playing, coaching, tournaments, and analysis.

Positives: - Chess24 has a large database of chess players with over 270,000 registered users. It hosts hundreds of daily live chess games and tournaments. - The interface is user-friendly and the site is well organized making it easy to navigate and find what you're looking for. - Chess24 has strong features for analyzing and improving your chess game. It tracks your stats, provides computer analysis of your games, and offers video lessons from grandmaster coaches. - There are daily events and shows hosted by grandmasters and other top chess personalities which provides a sense of community.

Negatives: - Chess24 offers both free and premium subscription plans but some features like computer analysis and lessons require a paid membership. - Some user reviews complain of issues with lag, disconnections, and other technical problems during live games.

Overall, Chess24 seems like a good option for players of all levels looking to improve their chess skills through analysis, lessons from grandmasters, and practice in daily tournaments and games. The strong community and events hosted by top players also make it an engaging platform. However, like all platforms, it does have some technical issues and the paid subscriptions can add up in cost. But for the features it offers, the pricing is reasonable compared to similar chess services.
